articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nicaragua
Suppression of Political Activities in S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nicaragua 
    Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was published in pamphlet on March 31 by the Leon City Publishing House of Nicaragua.
 The work, published on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), clearly explains the originality and superiority of the Juche philosophy over the preceding philosophies of the working class and indicates that the Juche philosophy serves as the revolutionary and political philosophy of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Celebration Meetings Held
Authorities' Crackdown Condemned in S. Korea
Hanchongryon Calls for Liquidating Ultra-Right Conservative Forces
Slogans of Struggle Issued
articles.content:
Hanchongryon Calls for Liquidating Ultra-Right Conservative Forces 
    Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Paek Jong Ho, chairman of the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon), reportedly issued a statement under the title "Ultra-right conservative forces, stop plots for coup" on April 3.
 The statement recalled that Kim Yong So, professor at Ehwa Woman's University, in a lecture on March 30 let loose a string of balderdash that now there is no way but a military coup for rebuilding the system of liberal democracy and, earlier, conservative organizations asserted that if the present government puts even the "National Assembly" under its control it can join hands with pro-north forces and accept the proposal for reunification by federal formula and that it is necessary to mobilize the army to put down such forces.    
 Such agitation for a military coup means a blatant challenge of the ultra-right conservative forces to the people who have struggled for democracy through the Kwangju popular uprising in 1980, the June 1987 people's resistance, candlelight demonstrations in memory of the two schoolgirls in 2002 and candlelight demonstrations for nullifying the "impeachment", defending democracy and realizing new politics in 2004, the statement said, adding: Hanchongryon will join the people in their struggle to judge the ultra-right forces agitating the military coup in the forthcoming "general election" and realize new politics.

articles.title: Jong Sun Dok Remembered
articles.content:
Slogans of Struggle Issued 
    Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Information Department of the Central Committee of the National Democratic Front of South Korea on March 31 made public slogans of struggle to shatter the plot of the United States and rightist conservative forces to scuttle the April "general election" in south Korea, according to the internet site Kuguk Jonson.
 The slogans called for resolutely checking the plot of the U.S. and rightist conservative forces to scuttle the "general election" and shattering the U.S. plot to postpone it through all-people resistance.    
 Calling for turning the "general election" into a scene of judgment to put an end to the U.S. interference in the internal affairs of south Korea, the slogans appealed to the voters to conclude the struggle against the "impeachment" with a victory in the "general election".

articles.title: Truth behind "Impeachment" in S. Korea Opened
DPRK Will Answer with Super-Tough Measure
articles.content:
Truth behind "Impeachment" in S. Korea Opened
    Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute issued an open letter on April 6 to inform the world of the whole story, background and the manipulation of the "impeachment" in south Korea.
 According to the open letter, such a dramatic development as the "change of regime between the ruling and opposition parties" took place in south Korea with the 15th "presidential election" in 1997 as a momentum. The ultra-rightist conservative forces including the Grand National Party was defeated once again at the 16th "presidential election" in 2002. As a result, they resorted to a brigandish method of seizing the regime with strength as gangsters did after being defeating in the twice consecutive "presidential elections".
 With bloodshot eyes on seizing the regime they began the "impeachment against the president" by taking it as a golden opportunity that the chief executive of south Korea made remarks supporting the Uri Party at a "special invitational lecture" on February 24 on the occasion of the first anniversary of his assumption of office as president. On March 9 they submitted to the "National Assembly" the "motion on the impeachment against the president" by adding the blame for "scandals of his close associates" and "failure of economy" to the "breach of the law on election".
 On March 11 they assembled the dissident law makers and even non-affiliated national assemblymen, secured the voting machine and thus used strength to railroad the "motion on impeachment" at the NA. At 11:30 a.m. of March 12 the opposition party gentries who totally "put the NA building under their control" declared the "passage" of the "motion on impeachment against the president" only in 27 minutes after voting started, with the result that unheard of "impeachment" development was caused in south Korea.
 This is the last-ditch efforts of those upset by the rapid growth of the patriotic forces for national independence and reunification in south Korea.
 The historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration opened a new era of the Korean nation itself. Road and railway links, sea and air routines are open between the north and the south through which people of all social standings come and go and dialogue,
contacts and cooperation are progressing apace between them. This made pro-U.S. sycophantic elements shudder.
 The "impeachment" development in south Korea shows an extremely anachronistic rebellion drama of the conservative forces to swim against the trend of the times toward independence, democracy and reunification and turn back the history to prolong their remaining days.
 The "impeachment" development in south Korea is the most despicable outcome produced by the old and corrupt socio-political system.
 The "impeachment" can be considered to be a fight between a big thief and a small thief in any sense. The ruling party said that as the total amount of money it swallowed up is less one tenth than what the GNP did, it would tender the "president's" resignation if it is surpassed. Meanwhile, the GNP, taking issue with the ruling party's "remarks about one tenth", blustered that the president should step down as promised because the limit passed. This is just like a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
 The scramble for power was more shameful. By nature, it can be said that the Grand National Party and the Democratic Party are in hostile relations as they are contrary to each other in the light of their roots, compositions and isms. The two diagonally opposite parties led the "impeachment" in conspiracy.
 The "impeachment" is a most barbarous violence caused by the illegal and lawless darkness and mediaeval political backwardness.
 It was a bloodless political coup, which was manipulated by the United States behind the scene.
 The legitimate establishment of the "government for the people" supported by the anti-U.S. independent forces for the first time in south Korea made the U.S. feel deep apprehensions. The U.S. made the first-stage operation to torment and suffocate the "government for the people" and let it step down of its own accord and then the second-stage operation to circulate a rumor about "impeachment" and then push forward it.
 It made the third-stage operation of forcibly promoting it. Particularly, when the situation reached the climax with the "motion on impeachment" submitted to the NA and being approved of it, the U.S. State Department, the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency and others directly commanded the operations, receiving in detail reports about the "impeachment" through the U.S. embassy in Seoul and other local ruling machines and information network. On March 13, the next day when the "motion on impeachment" was passed through the NA, the U.S. rapidly dispatched the secretary of the Department of Inter-Security to south Korea to meet "Prime Minister" Ko Kon who is to assume the "office of acting president" before anyone else as a "foreign envoy" and thus orchestrated a burlesque of officially recognizing the "impeachment".
  The U.S. "March 12 impeachment" was prompted by its strategic aim to refrain south Korea from conducting national cooperation with the DPRK, embroil the present south Korean regime more deeply into its anti-DPRK nuclear racket and its policy of stifling the DPRK and push ahead with the formation of a "siege on north Korea and continent" in Asia through the U.S.-Japan-south Korea tripartite cooperation.
 South Korea is in a political catastrophe and a state of anarchy owing to the "impeachment". The people are getting into rage. At least 1.6 million south Korean people have staged candlelight demonstrations against the "impeachment" since the "railroad" of the "motion on impeachment" through the NA. The number of organizations that participated in them is over 9,200. "One million-people meetings for nullifying the impeachment and defending democracy" were simultaneously held in Seoul and other areas of south Korea on
March 20. A 10 million signature campaign against the "impeachment" is being conducted and a "campaign for voting down national assemblymen who approved the motion on impeachment" is gaining in momentum.
 The opposition parties including the GNP became a family in mourning. The rate of supporting them dramatically dropped and they are in a crisis of bankruptcy as curses, like chickens, come home to roost.
 As the "impeachment" development is not progressing as intended by it, the United States is giving impetus to war moves, irritated at this. Some days ago, it announced the plan to deploy an update destroyer Aegis in the East Sea of Korea which has been deployed only in the major dispute areas and strategic regions. When an opportunity presents itself, the U.S. can kick up a military coup under the pretext of the confused south Korean political situation and unleash a war against the DPRK through military provocations along the Military Demarcation Line. The proof of this is the recent incidents in Iraq, Haiti and Georgia. The historic lesson shows that the U.S. left no stone unturned to meet its strategic interests.
 If the U.S. and the south Korean conservative forces orchestrate other play under the pretext of the situation caused in the wake of the passage of the "motion on impeachment" through the NA and the political situation confused before the "general election", they will stir up greater resentment of the people and face all-people resistance stronger than the April 19 popular uprising and the May 18 Kwangju popular uprising.

articles.title: Vigilance against Japan's Reinvasion Moves Urged
Postage Stamps Issued in Commemoration of Day of Sun
Chinese Delegations Here
Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chinese Delegations Here
    Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A Chinese government cultural delegation led by Zhao Weisui, vice-minister of Culture, and a Chinese symphony orchestra arrived here on April 6 to participate in the 22nd April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
 They were met by Song Sok Hwan and Pak Mu Jun who are vice-chairmen of the organizing committee of the festival and Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Prime Minister of France
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Chinese government cultural delegation on a visit to the DPRK.
 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Zhao Weisui, vice-minister of Culture, who is head of the delegation.

articles.title: Greetings to Foreign Minister of France
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Prime Minister of France
    Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Jean-Pierre Raffarin upon his remaining in office as prime minister of France.
 The message wished him great success in his responsible work.

articles.title: World Day of Health Observed
articles.content:
Greetings to Foreign Minister of France
    Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Michel Barnier on the occasion of his appointment as foreign minister of France.
 Expressing belief that the relations between the two countries would improve and develop, the message sincerely wished the foreign minister success in his work.
